title: Storage Engineer
description: Wintrust is a financial holding company with approximately $50 billion assets under management and traded on the NASDAQ:WTFC. Built on the "HAVE IT ALL" model, Wintrust offers sophisticated technology and resources of a large bank while focusing on providing service-based community banking to each and every customer. Wintrust operates fifteen community bank subsidiaries with over 170 banking locations in the greater Chicago and southern Wisconsin market areas. Additionally, Wintrust operates various non-bank business units including commercial and life insurance premium financing, short-term accounts receivable financing, out-sourced administrative services, mortgage origination and purchase, wealth management services and qualified intermediary services for tax-deferred exchanges.<p><br></p><strong>Why join us?</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>An award-winning culture rated as a Top Workplace by the Chicago Tribune for the past 9 years</li><li>Competitive pay, discretionary bonuses, and a comprehensive benefit package (including medical, dental, vision, life, and a 401k plan with a generous company match)</li><li>A promote-from-within culture that elevates team members to positions where they can excel even further</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Why join this team? </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>We are a dynamic and growing team that plays a critical role in Information Security at Wintrust. We are relied upon to accomplish significant projects, and engineers can employ all their talents.</li><li>Our team prides itself on valuing solutions over work for work’s sake. Being able to think outside the box is key, and our philosophy is reflected in exercising critical thinking with integrity and creativity. We trust your skill.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong><u>Position Summary</u></strong><p><br></p>This position will join our growing Penetration Testing team with a focus on maintaining an ongoing Purple Team philosophy. The Systems Engineer will functionally support the Wintrust Purple Team in reviewing the company's security controls, validating the results of vendor penetration tests, and highlighting security problems beyond the scope of day-to-day security operations. To be successful in this role, candidates should be comfortable with complex, open-ended problem solving rooted in collaboration and a drive for finding answers.<p><br></p><strong><u>Responsibilities</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Configuring and utilizing penetration testing and vulnerability assessment tools</li><li>Creating scopes for internally driven pen tests and creating reports to inform stakeholders</li><li>Validating the results of vendor pen test engagements and confirming partner reports</li><li>Researching and analyzing vulnerabilities, identifying relevant threats, preparing corrective action recommendations, and summarizing and reporting results</li><li>Proposing approaches for addressing security findings, including specialized controls, code or infrastructure changes, and changes in development processes</li><li>Recommending appropriate policy, standards, process &amp; procedural updates as part of findings</li><li>Producing metrics and reporting on the state of system security, threats, and vulnerabilities</li></ul><p><br></p><strong><u>Qualifications</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>2-5 years of experience performing penetration testing/ethical hacking with a solid understanding of:</li><li>Planning and completing Red/Purple Team operations to exercise and validate the organization's ability to prevent, detect, and respond to adversaries </li><li>Knowledge of MITRE ATT&amp;CK framework or detailed knowledge of global cyber threats, threat actors, and the tactics, techniques, and procedures used by cyber adversaries, specifically those targeting the financial services sector</li><li>Effective and organized reporting on findings derived from penetration testing engagements</li><li>Knowledge of common penetration testing tools and platforms (Kali Linux, Metasploit, etc)</li><li>Experience with common command control (c2) frameworks</li><li>Web application security concepts pertaining to modern web languages and frameworks</li><li>Network design and architecture</li><li>Programming/scripting languages (Python, Bash, Perl, PowerShell, etc)</li><li>Security controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security)</li><li>Windows and Linux environments, Active Directory, network monitoring and sniffing, TCP/IP networks, and vulnerability and threat management tools (including network-based scanners)</li><li>Certifications focusing on penetration testing (CEH, PenTest+, GPEN, GWAPT, OSCP, CPT, etc)</li></ul><p><br></p>From our first day in business, Wintrust has been proud to serve a variety of unique communities and people from all walks of life. To be Chicago’s Bank® and Wisconsin's Bank®, we need to reflect that diversity both in all the communities we serve, the people we employ, the organizations we work with, and our banking and lending practices. Wintrust Financial Corporation, including community banking and financial services subsidiaries, is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expressions, genetic information, marital status, age, disability, or status as a covered veteran or any other characteristic protected by law.<p><br></p>
description_json: Wintrust is a financial holding company with approximately $50 billion assets under management and traded on the NASDAQ:WTFC. Built on the "HAVE IT ALL" model, Wintrust offers sophisticated technology and resources of a large bank while focusing on providing service-based community banking to each and every customer. Wintrust operates fifteen community bank subsidiaries with over 170 banking locations in the greater Chicago and southern Wisconsin market areas. Additionally, Wintrust operates various non-bank business units including commercial and life insurance premium financing, short-term accounts receivable financing, out-sourced administrative services, mortgage origination and purchase, wealth management services and qualified intermediary services for tax-deferred exchanges.<p><br></p><strong>Why join us?</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>An award-winning culture rated as a Top Workplace by the Chicago Tribune for the past 9 years</li><li>Competitive pay, discretionary bonuses, and a comprehensive benefit package (including medical, dental, vision, life, and a 401k plan with a generous company match)</li><li>A promote-from-within culture that elevates team members to positions where they can excel even further</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Why join this team? </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>We are a dynamic and growing team that plays a critical role in Information Security at Wintrust. We are relied upon to accomplish significant projects, and engineers can employ all their talents.</li><li>Our team prides itself on valuing solutions over work for work’s sake. Being able to think outside the box is key, and our philosophy is reflected in exercising critical thinking with integrity and creativity. We trust your skill.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong><u>Position Summary</u></strong><p><br></p>This position will join our growing Penetration Testing team with a focus on maintaining an ongoing Purple Team philosophy. procedural updates as part of findings</li><li>Producing metrics and reporting on the state of system security, threats, and vulnerabilities</li></ul><p><br></p><strong><u>Qualifications</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>2-5 years of experience performing penetration testing/ethical hacking with a solid understanding of:</li><li>Planning and completing Red/Purple Team operations to exercise and validate the organization's ability to prevent, detect, and respond to adversaries </li><li>Knowledge of MITRE ATT&amp;CK framework or detailed knowledge of global cyber threats, threat actors, and the tactics, techniques, and procedures used by cyber adversaries, specifically those targeting the financial services sector</li><li>Effective and organized reporting on findings derived from penetration testing engagements</li><li>Knowledge of common penetration testing tools and platforms (Kali Linux, Metasploit, etc)</li><li>Experience with common command control (c2) frameworks</li><li>Web application security concepts pertaining to modern web languages and frameworks</li><li>Network design and architecture</li><li>Programming/scripting languages (Python, Bash, Perl, PowerShell, etc)</li><li>Security controls (e.g. access control, auditing, authentication, encryption, integrity, physical security, and application security)</li><li>Windows and Linux environments, Active Directory, network monitoring and sniffing, TCP/IP networks, and vulnerability and threat management tools (including network-based scanners)</li><li>Certifications focusing on penetration testing (CEH, PenTest+, GPEN, GWAPT, OSCP, CPT, etc)</li></ul><p><br></p>From our first day in business, Wintrust has been proud to serve a variety of unique communities and people from all walks of life. title: VBA & Full Stack Developer
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Wipro Ltd., is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Open for "C2H" only.</strong><p><br></p>We are Wipro (NYSE: WIT), a rapidly expanding and leading global Information Technology, Consulting and Business Process Services company with over 225,000 employees worldwide, servicing clients in 175+ cities and 69 countries across 6 continents. For more information, please visit<p><br></p><strong>Role:</strong> Sysyem Engineer<p><br></p>Location-IL.<p><br></p><strong>Role Description:</strong><p><br></p>Performs Problem determination and resolution of mobile Equipment and Software problems through the effective use of available technical resources. Resolves Problems, including completing all related administrative duties. Resolves Customer's Equipment/Software mobility Problem tickets.<p><br></p>Below is the JD- Field Support Engineer<p><br></p><ul><li>The Field Support Engineer will be responsible for the installation, configuration, and troubleshooting of network infrastructure hardware and software. This position supports a broad range of IT hardware and software.</li><li>The selected professional will be responsible for working with end users about the issues related to physical workstations, including laptops, desktops, peripherals, network devices, among others. Individual should also be well versed about remote troubleshooting and remote desktop support, Physical hardware inventory etc.</li><li>In addition, they will also be responsible for serving in a client-facing role to carry out imaging and deploying desktop equipment, fielding onsite escalations from services desk, supervisor and customer.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Responsible for installing, maintaining and repairing company and multi-vendor systems which include hardware, software and networking products as well as operating systems.</li><li>Diagnose and resolve various hardware performance issues, make decisions when appropriate related to replacing existing user workstation equipment and carry out the entire product replacement process, including the removal of existing IT assets as well as the implementation of new IT assets.</li><li>Takes responsibility for potential or desired follow-up services or problem escalation.</li><li>Should contribute directly to the implementation of new company service solutions, or short projects as per the supervisor?s directives.</li><li>Manage all IT assets, including tagging in / out existing and new IT assets as they are rolled out to end users.</li><li>Ensure the best possible experience when setting up new user equipment, perform the necessary onsite testing to assure existing and / or new employees have access to equipment, applications, and various other technical solutions.</li><li>Friendly presence and helpful attitude; good interpersonal skills and ability to work well with others.</li><li>Good problem solving skills; ability to visualize a problem or situation and think abstractly to solve it.</li><li>Ability to handle constantly changing flow of traffic; remain productive during slow times, be able to multitask effectively during busy times, exercise patience and professionalism during stressful situations.</li><li>Dealing with hardware and application support queries and issues reported to the Field Services team</li><li>Take ownership and responsibility of an issues from start through to a successful resolution</li><li>Escalate issues and involve experts wherever required in order to resolve issues as quickly as possible</li><li>Ensures that supported customer accurately completes the approved work request with the date and time of submission</li><li>Develop sound understanding of IT operations and related applications and IT systems as well as business related processes and procedures</li><li>Develop technical knowledge of each system within company profile and specialized knowledge of certain nominated areas</li><li>Maintain adequate knowledge of operating systems and application software used to provide a high level of support</li><li>Maintains and consistently demonstrates a general knowledge of company guidelines, processes, practices and procedures</li><li>When the restoration is beyond the scope of the Service Desk Agent he/she will escalate the issue/problem to proper tier 2 and 3 support team members</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Requirements</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>5+ years of experience working in a field services support capacity, with specific experience in the configuration, implementation, and maintenance of IT assets (Laptops, Desktops, Peripherals), troubleshooting and resolving any and all technical issues which require onsite service support.</li><li>Knowledge and practical experience troubleshooting and supporting local area data networking (hardware/software/protocols and best practices).</li><li>Knowledge of Incident Management, Service Request management, DEPOT model etc.</li><li>Proficiency in Microsoft Desktop OS (domain environment), Desktop application related configurations, troubleshooting etc..</li><li>Knowledge of standard Microsoft Productivity Applications such as Microsoft Office and Outlook. Familiarity with all major web browsers including Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, EDGE and IE etc.</li><li>Working knowledge of Apple-MAC operating systems and devices configuration and troubleshooting</li><li>Working knowledge of ServiceNow ticketing tool.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Wipro is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer and makes all employment and employment-related decisions without regard to a person's race, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability, sexual orientation, or any other status protected by applicable law</strong> System Engineer

Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Integration Engineer - </strong><p><br></p>Are you a talented Integration Engineer looking for an exhilarating career opportunity? Look no further! We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated individual to join our dynamic team as an Integration Engineer. In this role, you will work closely with our Integration Project Manager and Integration Support Engineer, focusing on the engineering and maintenance of our company's system Integration architecture.<p><br></p>What's in it for you?<p><br></p><ul><li>$90k-$115 Annual Salary </li><li>95% remote with occasional travel</li><li>Full-time Permanent Position</li><li>Growth opportunities within a vibrant team</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Qualifications: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>4+ years integration development experience (EDI, ERP)</li><li>Warehouse &amp; Transportation Management Systems</li><li>Logistics/Supply Chain experience</li><li>EDI transactions 204, 210, 214, 810, 846, 850, 856, 940, 943, 944, 945, 947, 990</li><li>Any additional EDI management and mapping tools</li></ul><p><br></p>Are you Interested?<p><br></p>Share this job with friends and family and earn dollars with every successful hire.

title: Systems Engineer - Penetration Tester
description: CNH Industrial is a world-class equipment and services company dedicated to advancing the noble work of agriculture and construction workers. Driven by our shared purpose of Breaking New Ground, we are passionate about bringing Innovation, Sustainability, and Productivity to all that we do. As a truly global company, CNH Industrial’s 37,000+ employees form part of a diverse and inclusive workplace, focused on empowering customers to grow, and build, a better world through our core brands: Case IH, STEYR, New Holland Agriculture, CASE, and New Holland Construction.<p><br></p>In Precision Technology, we make iron smarter. Our team members deliver innovative solutions helping our customers to be more productive, save time, lower costs, and to operate sustainably. From vehicle displays, application controls, steering solutions, digital services and telematics, to fully autonomous driverless technology, we develop solutions that solve challenges for customers around the world.<p><br></p><strong>Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p>The Vehicle Diagnostic Engineer develops the technical definitions and common standards to enable proper diagnostic and vehicle communication support to development, manufacturing and servicing of CNH Industrial's full line of Agricultural and Construction. The engineer will support on specifying the diagnostic and network communication requirements for each networked component.<p><br><br></p><ul><li> Understand diagnostic capabilities of ECUs. </li><li> Understand the configuration and service requirement of vehicle. </li><li> Develop/create documentation of diagnostic and network communication for supporting the vehicle development. </li><li> Design on-vehicle communication network including functional and diagnostic protocol, message definition, bus capacity and timing analysis. </li><li> Interface to vehicle integration, architectural, system and software engineers to support implementation of diagnostics and network designs. </li><li> Ensure support for verification and validation teams. </li><li> Ensure application of CNH Industrial and Industry standards (SAE, ISO) and best practices. </li><li> Understand intended product end user needs. </li><li> Demonstrates support for company culture in their daily actions. </li><li> Maintain a clean and safe work area. Follow established safety and ergonomic standards. </li><li> May be called upon to perform comparable duties of a similar or related nature and/or assist in other areas as needed. </li><li> Learning, understanding, continuously improving, and promoting the quality management system. <br></li></ul><p><br></p>The salary for this position is $101,200 to $146,050 annually. ( Actual salary offered will vary and will be based on several factors including skills, experience and qualifications for the role.)<p><br></p><strong>Qualifications</strong><p><br><br></p><ul><li> Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in Engineering. </li><li> 2+ years demonstratable experience automotive/off-road on vehicle networks and diagnostics (e.g. UDS, J1939, LIN). </li><li> Demonstrated ability to manage multiple concurrent projects, prioritize work an escalate issues appropriately. </li><li> Effective communication and presentation skills to peers, stakeholders, and senior-level leadership. </li><li> Proficiency with a computer, including use of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint. </li><li> Well-developed problem analysis and problem-solving techniques. </li><li> Team player who is self-motivated and can work with minimal supervision. </li><li> Ability to communicate effectively with employees and leadership staff. </li><li> Understanding of System Engineering Methods (e.g. V-Model). </li><li> Preferred experience using Vector diagnostics and network development tools (e.g. CANdela Studio, ODX Studio, CANoe, CANalyzer). </li><li> Preferred understanding of ECU I/O (e.g. Analog input channels, frequency input channels). </li><li> Preferred experience using collaboration tools and ALMs tools. <br></li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Company Benefits</strong><p><br></p>CNH Industrial offers a wide variety of benefits that not only encourages wellness and preventative care, but we also provide the right tools and programs to help you achieve it. Our benefits package includes medical, dental, vision, disability, and life insurance. Our industry leading 401k will support you in meeting your retirement objectives. Additional benefits include paid parental leave, flexible work policies, opportunities for self-development and paid leave for specific activities. Click here for more information!<p><br></p><strong> EEO </strong><p><br></p>US applicants: CNH Industrial is an equal opportunity employer. This company considers candidates regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status. Applicants can learn more about their rights by viewing the federal "EEO is the Law" poster and its supplement here . CNH Industrial participates in E-Verify and will provide the federal government with your Form I-9 information to confirm that you are authorized to work in the U.S. You can view additional information here.<p><br></p>If you need reasonable accommodation with the application process, please contact us at narecruitingmailbox@cnhind.com.<p><br></p>Read about our company’s commitment to pay transparency by clicking this link: pay transparency notice .<p><br></p>Canada applicants: CNH Industrial is an equal opportunity employer. This company considers candidates regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, place of origin, disability, marital status, family status, age, or any other ground prohibited by applicable provincial human rights legislation.

Follow established safety and ergonomic standards. </li><li> May be called upon to perform comparable duties of a similar or related nature and/or assist in other areas as needed. </li><li> Learning, understanding, continuously improving, and promoting the quality management system. <br></li></ul><p><br></p>The salary for this position is $101,200 to $146,050 annually. ( Actual salary offered will vary and will be based on several factors including skills, experience and qualifications for the role.)<p><br></p><strong>Qualifications</strong><p><br><br></p><ul><li> Minimum of a bachelor’s degree in Engineering. </li><li> 2+ years demonstratable experience automotive/off-road on vehicle networks and diagnostics (e.g. UDS, J1939, LIN). </li><li> Demonstrated ability to manage multiple concurrent projects, prioritize work an escalate issues appropriately. </li><li> Effective communication and presentation skills to peers, stakeholders, and senior-level leadership. </li><li> Proficiency with a computer, including use of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint. </li><li> Well-developed problem analysis and problem-solving techniques. </li><li> Team player who is self-motivated and can work with minimal supervision. </li><li> Ability to communicate effectively with employees and leadership staff. </li><li> Understanding of System Engineering Methods (e.g. V-Model). </li><li> Preferred experience using Vector diagnostics and network development tools (e.g. CANdela Studio, ODX Studio, CANoe, CANalyzer). </li><li> Preferred understanding of ECU I/O (e.g. Analog input channels, frequency input channels). </li><li> Preferred experience using collaboration tools and ALMs tools. <br></li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Company Benefits</strong><p><br></p>CNH Industrial offers a wide variety of benefits that not only encourages wellness and preventative care, but we also provide the right tools and programs to help you achieve it. Our benefits package includes medical, dental, vision, disability, and life insurance. Our industry leading 401k will support you in meeting your retirement objectives. Additional benefits include paid parental leave, flexible work policies, opportunities for self-development and paid leave for specific activities. Click here for more information!<p><br></p><strong> EEO </strong><p><br></p>US applicants: CNH Industrial is an equal opportunity employer. This company considers candidates regardless of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or veteran status. Applicants can learn more about their rights by viewing the federal "EEO is the Law" poster and its supplement here . CNH Industrial participates in E-Verify and will provide the federal government with your Form I-9 information to confirm that you are authorized to work in the U.S. You can view additional information here.<p><br></p>If you need reasonable accommodation with the application process, please contact us at narecruitingmailbox@cnhind.com.<p><br></p>Read about our company’s commitment to pay transparency by clicking this link: pay transparency notice .<p><br></p>Canada applicants: CNH Industrial is an equal opportunity employer. This company considers candidates regardless of race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, nationality, place of origin, disability, marital status, family status, age, or any other ground prohibited by applicable provincial human rights legislation.

title: System Engineer
description: <strong>Tenneco is one of the world’s leading designer, manufacturers and marketers of automotive products for original equipment and aftermarket customers, with approximately 78.000 team members working at more than 300 sites worldwide. Through our four business groups, Motorparts, Ride Performance, Clean Air and Powertrain, Tenneco is driving advancements in global mobility by delivering technology solutions for diversified global markets, including light vehicle, commercial truck, off-highway, industrial, motorsport and the aftermarket.</strong><p><br></p>This role will report to the Director of Identity and Access Management and will provide department leadership as an Information Security technical subject matter expert. As an Engineer in the Information Security team, you will be shaping the direction for protection of a leading global components and systems manufacturer for the automotive industry. As a member of the Security team you will be helping us protect our business across all global sites. You will serve as a strategic advisor to the IAM team and across the IT and Business leaders and engineers.<p><br></p><strong> Essential Duties and Responsibilities: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Implement and design IAM solutions with global stakeholders. </li><li> Responsible for the implementation and support of technical, process, and reporting elements of Authentication and Authorization </li><li> Provides in-depth technical direction and support to managed security service providers; proactively identifies, tracks, and mitigates risk to IT systems and operations. </li><li> Deploy Identity Governance solutions to meet Company requirements </li><li> Design, deploy, implement, and integrate with critical applications and infrastructure </li><li> Follow approved life cycle methodologies and create documentation for design and testing </li><li> Delivery of Microsoft Azure Native IAM tooling and automation, which serves out internal and external users </li><li> Responsible for engineering identity solutions for the enterprise in a highly complex environment with a blend of legacy and innovation platforms </li><li> Interact/coordinate with various IT and Business leaders and engineers </li><li> Provide technical oversight and direction to mid-level and junior engineers </li><li> Train and groom top talent to be experts in technology and IAM </li><li> Assist operations team as required, coordinate with product engineering teams and consulting firms </li><li> Work across IT teams to deliver IAM best practices for on-premises and cloud-based solutions for employees, contractors, vendors and customers </li><li> Provide technical expertise and real-life experience in creating solutions, designs, proof of concept and implementation </li><li> Conduct research and use knowledge of competitive solutions to effectively address IAM governance and operations </li><li> Ensures delivery of high-quality product on time and within budget </li><li> Develops and maintains security-related monitoring and logging procedures for IAM </li><li> Understands business priorities and focuses efforts towards aligning services to business requirements. </li><li> Troubleshoots complex issues with existing security and privacy protection standards. </li><li> Recommends and implements improvements to security services. </li><li> Develops partnerships with other business and IT functions involved in security and privacy matters. </li><li> Develops relationships with security vendors and external security experts. </li><li> Provides Information Security expertise and guidance to internal and external IT project team and IT. </li><li> Experience working with IAM of CICD pipeline technologies. </li></ul><p><br></p><strong> Required Skills </strong><strong> : </strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Knowledge of IAM products and tools </li><li> Implementation experience with Cloud environments, lifecycle events, governance, and authentication </li><li> Preserving evidence integrity according to standard operating procedures or national standards. </li><li> Ability to effectively prioritize multiple objectives and manage through a fast-paced, changing environment. </li><li> Highly collaborative with the ability to influence and drive behavior across the organization with other teams </li><li> Analytical problem-solving capabilities and strong decision-making skill </li><li> Ability to effectively communicate verbally and in writing with individuals across all levels the organization. </li><li> Knowledge and experience working across a geographically and culturally diverse organization. </li><li> Ability to adjust to changing priorities while multitasking effectively. </li><li> Ability to engineer, evaluate and document processes and lead teams in accomplishing process review and improvement. </li><li> Powershell, JSon, and Python experience is a must </li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Qualifications</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Bachelors’ Degree in Information Technology related field or commensurate experience. </li><li> 5+ years of working level experience in IAM. </li><li> 7-10+ years of experience in an Engineer or related role with experience in delivering operational process improvements. </li><li> Experience in assessing and mitigating risk. </li><li> Experience in a large-scale global IT enterprise environment. </li><li> Experience with administration and management of Windows, Linux, UNIX, Azure, Cloud, or mobile operating systems. </li><li> Strong knowledge of authentication technologies and tools </li></ul><p><br></p><strong>An Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.</strong>

title: Integration Engineer
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, System Edge (USA) L.L.C., is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>This is a Hybrid Position in Chicago. Candidate will need to go into Willis Tower once a week.<p><br></p>Manager wants LinkedIn Profiles on every resume. If there is no LinkedIn Profile it will be rejected.<p><br></p><strong>Job Overview And Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p>As a React Developer, you will help lead the modernization of United.com.<p><br></p>You will be responsible for writing efficient, testable, and reusable code using React and Redux.<p><br></p>We are looking for a developer who is passionate about writing the best quality code and has knowledge/experience across multiple technologies. A successful developer in this role will be one who can accurately comprehend business requirements and code creative solutions to satisfy those requirements to deliver on the best experience for our customers.<p><br></p>This role will be working within an agile team environment building new features for United.com and leading the way in enhancing the performance and quality of the codebase.<p><br></p>HERE’S WHAT YOU’LL BE DOING:<p><br></p><ul><li> Lead the design, development, and planning for solutions that maintain United’s technology standards</li><li> Solve complex performance problems and architectural challenges</li><li> Perform code reviews and mentor your peers</li><li> Help to troubleshoot, test, and maintain the product</li><li> Work in an Agile environment</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Required</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> 5+ years of experience in software development</li><li> 3+ years of expert level Javascript experience with React, Redux, Webpack and ES6 or equivalent experience</li><li> Experience in Source code repositories like Github</li><li> Experience with end to end CI/CD solutions using platforms like TeamCity</li><li> Experience with web application testing frameworks like Jest or Enzyme</li><li> Understanding of complex large-scale application architecture</li><li> Demonstrated technical leadership in a web application development team</li><li> Excellent communication and people skills</li><li> BS/BA, preferably in a technical or scientific field or equivalent experience, education or training</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Preferred</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Expertise in performance optimization techniques</li><li> Experience building rest api using .Net</li><li> Knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming</li><li> Ability to create high level application architecture</li></ul>

title: Java / C++ / Python Engineer / Remote
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>A Female-founded search and booking software development company is seeking Fullstack Engineers with experience in Backend Java Development, Frontend React Development, AWS Infrastructure, and Automation Testing. As part of their dynamic team, you'll have the opportunity to work on every aspect of their consumer-facing software, contributing to the complete lifecycle and ensuring an exceptional user experience.\u003cbr /\u003e Alongside the freedom of remote work, this company offers competitive compensation and equity, a refreshing concept of mandatory minimum of 15 days off and unlimited paid time off, comprehensive healthcare, and an array of additional perks to enhance the employee experience. If you're looking for a company with a collaborative culture, that truly values its employees' contributions apply for more information. description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>We are back with another job ad! It's the same stealth mode start up we're working with but this time they're looking for a React Native Engineer to work on their mobile blockchain wallet. Wallet is used to encourage their users to participate on their platform as they get rewarded the more they engage with the application. title: (ONSITE) VBA & Full Stack Developer - Riverwood, IL
description: ACCENTURE's Flexible Workforce solves clients’ toughest challenges by providing cross-industry expertise, unmatched innovation, World-class tech and talent. We help bring it all together to deliver tangible business outcomes for our clients with contractors and our extended workforce opportunities. Accenture is consistently recognized on FORTUNE’s 100 Best Companies to Work for and Diversity Inc’s Top 50 Companies for Diversity lists. And that's just the beginning. Now is the perfect time for you to consider opportunities through our Flexible Workforce.<p><br></p><strong><u>What's In It For You</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Collaborate with a diverse network of people</li><li>Actively deliver innovative solutions for Accenture's clients</li><li>Apply your skills and experience to help drive business transformation</li><li>Work locally or remotely, significantly reducing or eliminating the demands to travel</li></ul><p><br></p><strong><u>Basic Qualifications</u></strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Must have 5 - 7 years of experience of Oracle Insurance Policy Administration (OIPA) in Life and Annuity areas. </li><li>Insurance Elements knowledge from Equisoft in order to perform as a lead developer</li><li>Technical skills should include - C#, XML, Java, Insurance Elements</li><li>Knowledge of AWS would be a plus</li></ul><p><br></p>Keywords<strong>: Web Developer, OIPA </strong><p><br></p>What We Believe<p><br></p>We have an unwavering commitment to diversity with the aim that every one of our people has a full sense of belonging within our organization. As a business imperative, every person at Accenture has the responsibility to create and sustain an inclusive environment.<p><br></p>Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities. Read more here<p><br></p>Equal Employment Opportunity Statement<p><br></p>Accenture is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We believe that no one should be discriminated against because of their differences, such as age, disability, ethnicity, gender, gender identity and expression, religion or sexual orientation. Our rich diversity makes us more innovative, more competitive and more creative, which helps us better serve our clients and our communities.<p><br></p>All employment decisions shall be made without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by federal, state, or local law.<p><br></p>Please be aware that Accenture requires all contractors to be fully vaccinated as a condition of placement, abiding by applicable federal, state &amp; local laws. Requests for medical or religious accommodation to this vaccination requirement will be reviewed if an offer is extended by the supplier.<p><br></p>Accenture is committed to providing veteran employment opportunities to our service men and women.<p><br></p>For details, view a copy of the Accenture Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Policy Statement<p><br></p>Requesting An Accommodation for this specific opportunity<p><br></p>Accenture is committed to providing equal employment opportunities for persons with disabilities or religious observances, including reasonable accommodation when needed. If you are going to be placed on an Accenture project and require accommodation to perform the essential functions of the opportunity, you will be asked to participate in our reasonable accommodation process as it relates to the initial interview process and for ongoing support, you will need to consult your supplier as their reasonable accommodation process if an offer is extended. Accommodations made to facilitate the recruiting process are not a guarantee of future or continued accommodations once hired.<p><br></p>If you have accommodation needs for a disability or religious observance, please call us toll free at 1 (877) 889-9009, send us an email or speak with your recruiter.<p><br></p>Other Employment Statements<p><br></p>Applicants for placement consideration in the US must have work authorization that does not now or in the future require sponsorship of a visa for employment authorization in the United States.<p><br></p>Candidates who are currently employed by a client of Accenture or an affiliated Accenture business may not be eligible for consideration.<p><br></p>Job candidates will not be obligated to disclose sealed or expunged records of conviction or arrest as part of the hiring process.<p><br></p>The Company will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. Additionally, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the Company's legal duty to furnish information.

title: React Native Engineer
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>This client has created an innovative search and booking engine that helps customers find the best ways to use their travel points and miles. Not only have they been ranked 5/5 stars as the best booking service of 2021, but they also have also been advertised by Forbes, The New York Times, ABC and more!\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e It searches 30+ loyalty and 100+ airline programs to find the best value possible.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e They find the best flights for your points - including seats the airlines don't advertise. Then they show your options side-by-side, so you know you're getting the best deal. \u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e They emphasize diversity and are crafting an inclusive, collaborative, and exciting culture for their team members to grow with.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e They have multiple openings including Mid and Senior level roles. As a Full Stack Java Engineer, you will build a consumer website by developing sophisticated algorithms and highly available systems to offer best-in-class services to their customers. You will help build the systems and algorithms that power their services, scale those systems for growth, and continuously improve their engineering practice! You will be leveraging Java, Spring Boot, React, and CI/CD pipelines while deploying into AWS using Docker.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eRequired Skills &amp; Experience\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eDegree in Computer Science or something complementary \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e2-5 years of experience in Software Development \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eStrong experience with AWS \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eDocker/Kubernetes \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eReact \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eCICD using Jenkins \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eTesting experience using either Cucumber or Selenium preferably \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eThe Offer\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eHealth Insurance Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eDental Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eVision Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003ePTO Minimum of 15 Days \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eTeam Outings and Trips \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Full Stack Engineer/Stable SaaS Company/Fully Remote<p><br></p>

description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Retail Business Services, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Address: </strong>USA-IL-Chicago-300 South Riverside Plaza<p><br></p><strong>Store Code: </strong>Greenville Data Center - It (5118634)<p><br></p>Retail Business Services, ranked No. 25 on Fast Company's 2022 100 Best Workplaces for Innovators, is the services company of leading grocery retail group Ahold Delhaize USA, which includes Food Lion, Giant Food, The GIANT Company, Hannaford and Stop &amp; Shop.<p><br></p><strong>Primary Purpose: </strong><p><br></p>Platform Reliability Engineer will help ensure service availability, identifying and automating manual processes, and bridging the gaps between product development teams and operations. Implementing operational improvements in availability, latency, performance, efficiency, change management, monitoring, incident response, patch management and capacity planning are all within scope for this role. automation and infrastructure as code</li><li> Manages, and operates the continuous delivery framework and tools, manages, and automates the lifecycle of the different cloud platform components and help support product teams</li><li> Leverage cloud architecture, applying site reliability principles, full-stack troubleshooting skills across network, application, security, Identity, OS, Containers, on-prem, and distributed services layers.</li><li> Provide reasoning about system &amp; application architecture as well as be comfortable looking at code and offering feedback on how it can be improved to increase reliability.</li><li> Identify opportunities and drive the implementation of automation to improve patch management, service health, manageability, reliability, and telemetry.</li><li> Own, triage, investigate and resolve service issues with an emphasis on broad communications, learning &amp; teaching throughout the process</li><li> Design process or technology solutions that monitor, identify, and resolve platform, system, deployment, and environmental issues both prior &amp; post production releases, and ensure measurable improvements against Service KPIs.</li><li> Drive Security and compliance aspects for services in accordance with Azure compliance requirements.</li><li> Engage in service capacity planning, demand forecasting and work towards Azure cost optimizations.</li><li> Create and document Runbooks, Operational procedures, and Standards on confluence</li><li> Communicate on a deeply technical level with product engineering, project management and product teams to improve and optimize products, improve infrastructure, and evolve services.</li><li> Work within a project management/agile scrum teams in a support role as part of a wider team</li><li> Remain current on new technologies, methods and procedures including, but not limited to, coding practices such as Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment and Operational excellence.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Qualifications:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field</li><li> 7+ years of IT experience focused on infrastructure which includes server, storage, network, security Identity</li><li> 3+ years of experience supporting, maintaining, and automating Azure environments</li><li> 2+ years of experience using IaC tools (ARM, Terraform, JSON,YAML, PowerShell, Github etc...)</li><li> Production experience in Cloud technologies - Azure IaaS, PaaS, networking, Azure functions, Azure automation and runbooks, workbooks, Insights, Security center, Azure Monitor, Log Analytics.</li><li> Ability to read, write, configure, design, and script end-to-end service telemetry, alerting and self healing capabilities for platform services</li><li> Ability to work in an Extreme Programming environment and work in a paired programming/operating model</li><li> Able to facilitate diverse teams, multi-task, and work under pressure to meet aggressive schedule targets</li><li> Hands on experience with IaC tools like ADO, ARM, terraform, ansible, PowerShell, python, azcli, github</li><li> Experience in service capacity planning, demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning</li><li> Technical and Operational expertise in Windows/Linux/VMware/Hyper-V/AKS, SQL and N0-SQL DB's, IaaS, PaaS FaaS, Data, BCDR, Security, Management, Storage, Networking, Monitoring, Identity and Connectivity</li><li> Experience managing and maintaining code repos, build systems, and CICD pipelines</li><li> Experience in infrastructure and configuration as code, as well as service auto-scale capabilities.</li><li> Worked in Devops and Agile environments, Blend of both Development and SRE mindset</li><li> Systematic problem-solving and troubleshooting skills coupled with a strong sense of ownership and drive.</li><li> Participate in on call rotation. Participate, collaborate, and provide guidance in retrospectives.</li><li> At least 4 years of hands-on operational experience supporting the following or related experience:</li><li>Azure Virtual Network, VWAN, Express route, Load Balancer (L4/L7), Traffic Manager, CDN, Azure DNS, routing &amp; routing protocols like BGP, firewall concepts</li><li>Azure Identity including any of the following: Azure AD, PIM, Conditional Access, MFA, Azure AD Connect, Password less sign-ins, Microsoft Defender, key vault</li><li>Azure Governance, Security, Monitoring, Workbooks, Compliance, and cost awareness</li><li>Azure Virtual Machines, Containers and/or Kubernetes and/or OpenShift (infrastructure perspective)</li><li>Azure Storage Account, Disk, Snapshot, Backup, Site Recovery, file sync, Data Lake.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Preferred Qualifications: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Certifications in Azure Administrator, Azure DevOps, Azure Solutions Architect.</li></ul><p><br></p>#DICEJobs<p><br></p>Retail Business Services currently provides services to five omnichannel grocery brands, including Food Lion, Giant Food, The GIANT Company, Hannaford and Stop &amp; Shop. description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Business Integra, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Role- Software Developer: II</strong><p><br></p><strong>Location- Deerfield, IL (Hybrid once in Month)</strong><p><br></p><strong>Contract to Hire, Direct Client</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Summary:</strong><p><br></p>Software Application Developer - II should have a good understanding of the Salesforce software platform and APEX programming language. The incumbent will possess ability to learn new technology quickly and continually improve their technical skills. This role will also focus on the development of software solutions with moderate guidance from Lead/Senior developers.<p><br></p><strong>Job Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Develop and test the assigned tasks to meet the appropriate requirements as per the software design</li><li>Design, build, and maintain system integrations to bring data in and out of Salesforce, using the appropriate Platform capabilities</li><li>Participate in all phases of software development life cycle including functional analysis, development, prototyping, coding, testing, deployment, and support.</li><li>Maintain updated knowledge of new and emerging industry trends and technology</li><li>Assist in documenting required technical artifacts as needed during the project life cycle</li><li>Participate in code reviews to ensure coding standards and best practices are followed</li><li>Work with cross-functional teams and communicate with the stakeholders</li><li>Supports resolutions of defects during system testing, UAT</li><li>Perform demos of the software to the team, receive and incorporate feedbacks</li><li>Align with IT processes and security standards while executing the tasks</li><li>Work with product managers to drive strategic value through custom applications built on salesforce</li><li>Work in the Salesforce.com development environment which includes custom objects, workflows, triggers, SOQL &amp; SOSL.</li></ul><p><br></p>Internal Controls:<p><br></p>Ensures that established processes and procedures are followed as designed to support internal control efforts. Develops and implements corrective actions regarding department internal controls as necessary.<p><br></p><strong>Successful incumbents will have:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>2-4 years of experience in software design and development</li><li>Bachelor’s degree is required (preferably information technology or computer science)</li><li>Basic knowledge of latest software platforms/languages, cloud technologies</li><li>Basic understanding of SDLC, software methodologies and processes</li><li>Excellent communication (verbal / written) and interpersonal skills</li><li>Self-motivated; accepts ownership and welcomes responsibility.</li><li>Ability to work independently with some guidance and collaboratively with others.</li><li> Development experience in Salesforce including Apex, Lightning Web Components, Visualforce, APIs, custom controllers, and triggers</li><li> Working experience with Salesforce.com including Sales, Service, Community, Marketing and Analytics Clouds</li><li> Experience with one or more object-oriented languages (e.g., C#, Java/Groovy, Python)</li><li> Experience with RESTful and Service Oriented API Architectures</li><li> Experience with Agile/Scrum methodology</li><li> Experience or knowledge of source control and DevOps practice (e.g., Azure DevOps)</li><li> Knowledge of one or more non-Salesforce technology stacks (e.g., Node.js, .NET Core, Azure Cloud)</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Position Scope/Contribution:</strong><p><br></p>Software Application Developer - II has the responsibility to develop and maintain software solutions with moderate guidance from Lead/Senior Developers. The incumbent will possess the ability to learn new technology quickly and continually improve their technical skills<p><br></p>Software Developer: II (Intermediate salesforce developer)

description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>This client has created an innovative search and booking engine that helps customers find the best ways to use their travel points and miles. Not only have they been ranked 5/5 stars as the best booking service of 2021, but they also have also been advertised by Forbes, The New York Times, ABC and more!\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e It searches 30+ loyalty and 100+ airline programs to find the best value possible.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e They find the best flights for your points - including seats the airlines don't advertise. Then they show your options side-by-side, so you know you're getting the best deal. \u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e They emphasize diversity and are crafting an inclusive, collaborative, and exciting culture for their team members to grow with.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e They have multiple openings including Mid and Senior level roles. As a Full Stack Java Engineer, you will build a consumer website by developing sophisticated algorithms and highly available systems to offer best-in-class services to their customers. You will help build the systems and algorithms that power their services, scale those systems for growth, and continuously improve their engineering practice! You will be leveraging Java, Spring Boot, React, and CI/CD pipelines while deploying into AWS using Docker.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eRequired Skills &amp; Experience\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eDegree in Computer Science or something complementary \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e2-5 years of experience in Software Development \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eStrong experience with AWS \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eDocker/Kubernetes \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eReact \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eCICD using Jenkins \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eTesting experience using either Cucumber or Selenium preferably \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eThe Offer\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eHealth Insurance Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eDental Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eVision Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003ePTO Minimum of 15 Days \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eTeam Outings and Trips \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e FullStack Engineer/SaaS/Remote/Amazing Work Culture<p><br></p>

title: Full Stack Engineer/Stable SaaS Company/Fully Remote
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>A top-rated booking service is breaking the industry with their innovative search engine that helps travelers maximize their return on investment. They're growing the team, and looking to hire a Senior Fullstack Engineer fully remotely.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e The Fullstack Engineer will have the opportunity to work with their service from end to end - their complex backend algorithm leverages mainly Java and Spring Boot (with a little Kotlin &amp; Node), their UI is written in React, and they are entirely AWS hosted, leveraging various cloud services.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e This is also a lucrative opportunity for someone looking to enhance their Machine Learning skills, pick up Machine Learning skills along the way, or work adjacent to Machine Learning as the engineering team will also be building a Machine Learning model that will use historical data to predict pricing and availability of future inventory.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Fullstack Engineers with the desire to work for a collaborative, energetic team at the forefront of innovation on a fully remote basis should apply for more information! Required Skills &amp; Experience \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eBachelor of Science in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or another related field\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e5+ years of professional software engineering experience with modern Java\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e2+ years of professional React experience\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eStrong understanding of complex data structures and algorithms\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eCloud experience\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e Desired Skills &amp; Experience \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eExperience building Machine Learning models is a plus\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eExperience in the travel or rewards industry would go a long way\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e50% Java\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e50% React\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e Daily Responsibilities \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e75% Hands On\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e25% Team Collaboration\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e The Offer \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eEquity eligible\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e You will receive the following benefits: \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eFully remote working\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eMinimum 3 weeks of PTO per year REQUIRED\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eOffsite company outings\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eMedical Insurance \u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eDental Benefits\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eVision Benefits\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e401(k)\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Remote Fullstack Java Engineer / React / Machine Learning<p><br></p>

They're growing the team, and looking to hire a Senior Fullstack Engineer fully remotely.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e The Fullstack Engineer will have the opportunity to work with their service from end to end - their complex backend algorithm leverages mainly Java and Spring Boot (with a little Kotlin &amp; Node), their UI is written in React, and they are entirely AWS hosted, leveraging various cloud services.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e This is also a lucrative opportunity for someone looking to enhance their Machine Learning skills, pick up Machine Learning skills along the way, or work adjacent to Machine Learning as the engineering team will also be building a Machine Learning model that will use historical data to predict pricing and availability of future inventory.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Fullstack Engineers with the desire to work for a collaborative, energetic team at the forefront of innovation on a fully remote basis should apply for more information! Required Skills &amp; Experience \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eBachelor of Science in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or another related field\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e5+ years of professional software engineering experience with modern Java\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e2+ years of professional React experience\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eStrong understanding of complex data structures and algorithms\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eCloud experience\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e Desired Skills &amp; Experience \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eExperience building Machine Learning models is a plus\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eExperience in the travel or rewards industry would go a long way\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e50% Java\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e50% React\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e Daily Responsibilities \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e75% Hands On\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e25% Team Collaboration\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e The Offer \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eEquity eligible\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e You will receive the following benefits: \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eFully remote working\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eMinimum 3 weeks of PTO per year REQUIRED\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eOffsite company outings\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eMedical Insurance \u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eDental Benefits\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eVision Benefits\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e401(k)\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.\u003cbr /\u003e \u003cbr /\u003e Remote Fullstack Java Engineer / React / Machine Learning<p><br></p>

title: Web Developer
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Retail Business Services, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Address: </strong>USA-IL-Chicago-300 South Riverside Plaza<p><br></p><strong>Store Code: </strong>Greenville Data Center - It (5118626)<p><br></p>Retail Business Services, ranked No. 25 on Fast Company's 2022 100 Best Workplaces for Innovators, is the services company of leading grocery retail group Ahold Delhaize USA, which includes Food Lion, Giant Food, The GIANT Company, Hannaford and Stop &amp; Shop.<p><br></p><strong>Primary Purpose:</strong><p><br></p>Platform Reliability Engineer will help ensure service availability, identifying and automating manual processes, and bridging the gaps between product development teams and operations. Implementing operational improvements in availability, latency, performance, efficiency, change management, monitorChriing, incident response, patch management and capacity planning are all within scope for this role. Whether it's done through code, the introduction of modern tools, and/or better processes continuous improvement and efficiency is the goal.<p><br></p>You'll provide operational excellence with troubleshooting skills, ownership in supporting various Azure services<p><br></p><strong>Duties and Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Builds, manages, and operate Azure Core Services with automation and infrastructure as code</li><li> Manages, and operates the continuous delivery framework and tools, manages, and automates the lifecycle of the different platform components and help support product teams</li><li> Leverage cloud architecture, applying site reliability principles, full-stack troubleshooting skills across network, application, security, Identity, OS, Containers, on-prem, and distributed services layers.</li><li> Lead and set strategy, roadmap for cloud reliability and recommend best practices for Operations</li><li> Mentor the team members to follow the frameworks and guide them to accelerate delivery of projects</li><li> Provide reasoning about system &amp; application architecture as well as be comfortable looking at code and offering feedback on how it can be improved to increase reliability.</li><li> Identify opportunities and drive the implementation of automation to improve patch management, service health, manageability, reliability, and telemetry.</li><li> Own, triage, investigate and resolve service issues with an emphasis on broad communications, learning &amp; teaching throughout the process</li><li> Design process or technology solutions that monitor, identify, and resolve platform, system, deployment, and environmental issues both prior &amp; post production releases, and ensure measurable improvements against Service KPIs.</li><li> Drive Security and compliance aspects for services in accordance with Azure compliance requirements.</li><li> Engage in service capacity planning, demand forecasting and work towards Azure cost optimizations.</li><li> Create and document Runbooks, Operational procedures, and Standards on confluence</li><li> Communicate on a deeply technical level with product engineering, project management and product teams to improve and optimize products, improve infrastructure, and evolve services.</li><li> Work within a project management/agile scrum teams in a support role as part of a wider team</li><li> Remain current on new technologies, methods and procedures including, but not limited to, coding practices such as Test Driven Development, Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment and Operational excellence/</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Qualifications:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, or related field</li><li> 8+ years of IT experience focused on infrastructure which includes server, storage, network, security, Identity</li><li> 4+ years of experience supporting, maintaining, and automating Azure environments</li><li> 3+ years of experience using IaC tools (ARM, Terraform, JSON,YAML, PowerShell, Github etc...)</li><li> Production experience in Cloud technologies - Azure IaaS, PaaS, networking, Azure functions, Azure automation and runbooks, workbooks, Insights, Security center, Azure Monitor, Log Analytics.</li><li> Ability to read, write, configure, design, and script end-to-end service telemetry, alerting and self-healing capabilities for platform services, lead the execution and ongoing management of services</li><li> Ability to work in an Extreme Programming environment and work in a paired programming/operating model, able to lead the team and help remove roadblocks</li><li> Able to facilitate diverse teams, multi-task, and work under pressure to meet aggressive schedule targets</li><li> Hands on experience with IaC tools like ADO, ARM, terraform, ansible, PowerShell, python, azcli, github</li><li> Experience in service capacity planning, demand forecasting, software performance analysis and system tuning</li><li> Technical and Operational expertise in Windows/Linux/VMware/Hyper-V/AKS, SQL and N0-SQL DB's, IaaS, PaaS, FaaS, Data, BCDR, Security, Management, Storage, Networking, Monitoring, Identity and Connectivity</li><li> Experience managing and maintaining code repos, build systems, and CICD pipelines</li><li> Experience in infrastructure and configuration as code, as well as service auto-scale capabilities.</li><li> Worked in Devops and Agile environments, Blend of both Development and SRE mindset</li><li> Systematic problem-solving and troubleshooting skills coupled with a strong sense of ownership and drive.</li><li> Participate in on call rotation. Participate, collaborate, and provide guidance in retrospectives.</li><li> At least 4 years of hands-on operational experience supporting the following or related experience:</li><li>Azure Virtual Network, VWAN, Express route, Load Balancer (L4/L7), Traffic Manager, CDN, Azure DNS, routing &amp; routing protocols like BGP, firewall concepts</li><li>Azure Identity including any of the following: Azure AD, PIM, Conditional Access, MFA, Azure AD Connect, Password less sign-ins, Microsoft Defender, key vault</li><li>Azure Governance, Security, Monitoring, Workbooks, Compliance, and cost awareness</li><li>Azure Virtual Machines, Containers and/or Kubernetes and/or OpenShift (infrastructure perspective)</li><li>Azure Storage Account, Disk, Snapshot, Backup, Site Recovery, file sync, Data Lake/</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Preferred Qualifications: </strong><p><br></p><ul><li> Certification in Azure Administrator -required, Azure DevOps -preferred, Azure Solutions Architect -preferred</li></ul><p><br></p>LI-RV1 #DICEJobs<p><br></p>Retail Business Services currently provides services to five omnichannel grocery brands, including Food Lion, Giant Food, The GIANT Company, Hannaford and Stop &amp; Shop. Retail Business Services leverages the scale of the local brands to drive synergies and provide industry-leading expertise, insights and analytics to local brands to support their strategies. We are committed to diversity, equity and inclusion and we foster a community of belonging where everyone is valued.<p><br></p>Retail Business Services is an equal opportunity employer. We comply with all applicable federal, state and local laws. Qualified applicants are considered without regard to sex, race, color, ancestry, national origin, citizenship status, religion, age, marital status (including civil unions), military service, veteran status, pregnancy (including childbirth and related medical conditions), genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity, legally recognized disability, domestic violence victim status or any other characteristic protected by law. We provide reasonable accommodations to applicants and employees with disabilities. As important as what we do is how we do it. Our team embodies our values of Courage, Care, Teamwork, Integrity and Humor in everything that they do. We have a culture of care that values and celebrates the qualities and perspectives that make us all unique.<p><br></p>If you have a disability and require assistance in the application process, please contact our Talent Acquisition Department at .<p><br></p>For more information, visit .<p><br></p>Job Requisition: 306572_external_USA-IL-Chicago_6152023 Cloud Reliability Engineer<p><br></p>

Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Career Opportunity:</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Title</strong>: Azure Devops Engineer (Hybrid)<p><br></p><strong>About CodeForce 360</strong><p><br></p>Making a career choice is amongst the most critical choices one can make, and it's important for the choice to be calculated with factors such as a company's run of success since its inception and more. But, when you come across a company that has reputation proven with nothing but an illustrious run of success since the day it began, you don't need to think of anything else. That's precisely what some of our employees and prospective employees think when they came across CodeForce 360.<p><br></p><strong>Position Overview</strong><p><br></p>Azure Devops Engineer (Hybrid)<p><br></p><strong>Requirements:</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Description:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Over all 8 + Years of experience out which 4 years in Azure cloud.</li><li>Azure certified cloud architect.</li><li>Expert in Azure cloud Platform, Terraform and Databricks.</li><li>Expert in Security Architecture.</li><li>Experience in ADF, Data ingestion , Azure Synapse.</li><li>Lead a Lead of Engineers.</li><li>Experience in Support large cloud platform</li><li>Work in Offshore and Onsite model.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>How To Apply</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job ID:</strong> JPC - 159100<p><br></p>For more information, please contact below:<p><br></p>Raju Sangam<p><br></p>Qualified individuals will be contacted for an interview<p><br></p>

title: Software Developer: II (Intermediate salesforce developer)
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, 1 Point System, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>Apigee developer<p><br></p>Location: Hybrid-Chicago Location-12 Month Contract- starting day 1, is open to candidates who need to relocate but they need to be here on day 1 and they do not help with travel cost/expenses for the in-person interview.<p><br></p>Duration: 12 month contract<p><br></p>Tech Stack: API Proxies, Apigee Edge, AWS, Azure API Gateway or similar, API Tools: Swagger, postman, Linting Tools like Spectral, OAuth<p><br></p>Years of Experience: Degree with 2.2 years of year experience<p><br></p>Three Skills they are looking for on a resume: Bachelor’s Degree &amp; Years of Experience Minimum 4-page Resume Limit<p><br></p>Interview Process/Times:<p><br></p><ul><li> Two- Step</li><li>First Round is a 15-minute Technical Video Screening</li><li>Second Round would be an In Person/Onsite-Chicago Interview</li></ul><p><br></p>Day-To-Day/Project Scope:<p><br></p><ul><li> My team is responsible for the process control and tools that supports development, security operation, completion convention, monitoring of API’S, we support on enterprise as well. My team is like an operational team we support on the onboarding of API’s on Apigee specifically</li><li> We are looking for hands on experience:</li><li> Hands on Experience with Apigee Edge</li><li>Speck reviews, Apigee Edge, or Similar tools or Proficient in Spectral, and knowledge of security standards such as OAuth 2.0 Or TLS.</li><li>Process development</li><li>Support us on our rotational on call-supports</li><li>Writing on API’S proxi’s on API gateway or azure API gateway</li><li> They are working 95% internal, less than5 % working on external</li><li>Hands on experience API Tools-swagger, postman, linting tools like Spectral or similar tools would be a big plus</li><li>Hands on experience with Kibana, Grafana- Desired</li><li>OAuth is highly required</li><li>Looking for Api gateway line- (we technically work like gateway)</li></ul>

title: FullStack Engineer/SaaS/Remote/Amazing Work Culture
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, VBridge Global, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>Hello,<p><br></p>My name is Meenakshi Pandey,Staffing Specialist at Vbridge global LLC .We are a national recruiting company which partners with many of the leading employers across the United States.<p><br></p>I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our direct clients.<p><br></p>Job Title Salesforce Prog/Analyst IV<p><br></p>Rate $46/hr on W2<p><br></p>Location Chicago, IL<p><br></p><strong>Job Description</strong><p><br></p>This position may be offered to a candidate authorized to work in the US for his/her/their stated employer, without any restrictions which would prevent the candidate from working on the proposed assignment for the duration of the assignment period.<p><br></p>Job description:<p><br></p>A Salesforce DevOps Engineer works with application developers, release management, the infrastructure IT team and business staff to oversee the code release, combining an understanding of both engineering and coding. From creating and implementing software to analyzing data to improve existing applications, a DevOps Engineer increases productivity in the workplace. They understand the SDLC (Software Development Lifecycle) and have a clear understanding of various automation tools for developing build and deploy pipelines (CI/CD Pipelines).<p><br></p>Experience in Git, GitHub as a version control.<p><br></p>Experience in various branching strategies for complex multiple concurrent teams based deployment<p><br></p>Experience managing DevOps process across multiple organizations and business units.<p><br></p>Experience in managing Salesforce metadata through version control.<p><br></p>Experience in CI/CD Tools ( Git/Github Actions)<p><br></p>Good understanding of Salesforce environments including security, version control and metadata deployment and management.<p><br></p>Bachelor's degree required<p><br></p>Any Salesforce or DevOps related certification is a bonus<p><br></p>Thanks &amp; Regards,<p><br></p>Meenakshi Pandey |Sr.Technical Recruiter<p><br></p>VBridge Global LLC | An E-Verify Employer<p><br></p>Women-Owned Minority Certified Business<p><br></p>Direct ::<p><br></p>;/p&gt;

title: Remote Fullstack Java Engineer / React / Machine Learning
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Oscar Technology, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Key Responsibilities</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Design, deploy and maintain IAM solutions to manage internal and external user access to our cloud based applications and services</li><li>Develop, implement and maintain automated IAM workflows and processes using e.g., AWS Cognito, Azure AD, MS Entra</li><li>Collaborate with cross functional teams to integrate IAM solutions with other in-house developed platforms and solutions</li><li>Collaborate with the security monitoring team to monitor and analyze IAM metrics and logs to identify security issues</li><li>Provide technical expertise and support to mobile and web development teams to ensure that IAM requirements are met during the development process</li><li>Stay up-to-date with industry trends and developments in IAM technologies and risks and recommend changes to improve our IAM solutions</li><li>Other duties as assigned</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Requirements</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Computer science, Information technology or related field</li><li>4+ years of experience in DevOps or IAM engineering roles</li><li>Strong experience with AWS security best practices, including IAM, KMS and Cloudtrail</li><li>Hands on experience with AWS Cognito, including user authentication, authorization and security flows</li><li>Extra bonus - hands one experience with Azure AD and MS Entra</li><li>Experience with automation tools, such as Terraform</li><li>Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skills</li><li>Be flexible to Hybrid and live in Chicago.</li></ul><p><br></p><strong> Nice To Have </strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Basic knowledge of cryptocurrency and blockchains</li><li>General passion and knowledge of fintech and crypto</li></ul><p><br></p>Oscar Associates Limited (US) is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

title: Cloud Reliability Engineer

title: Apigee developer
