title: .Net Software Engineer / Chicago
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>\u003cstrong\u003eA Ticketing company based is looking for a highly skilled Senior Engineer to join our team. As a Senior Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our client-facing web application\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eRequired Skills &amp; Experience\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003e4-6 years of experience building out client-facing web applications\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eStrong technical skills in Angular/TypeScript, .Net Core, and T-SQL or SQL\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eExperience with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eUnderstanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eExcellent problem-solving and analytical skills\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eExcellent communication and interpersonal skills\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eAbility to work independently and as part of a team\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e\u003cstrong\u003eBachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field\u003c/strong\u003e\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eDesired Skills &amp; Experience\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eTicketing Experience \u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eWhat You Will Be Doing\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eDevelop and maintain client-facing web applications using Angular/TypeScript, .Net Core, and T-SQL or SQL\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eCollaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features and functionality\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eWrite clean, maintainable, and testable code\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eParticipate in code reviews and contribute to improving our development processes\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eTroubleshoot and debug issues in production and provide timely solutions\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eMentor and guide junior team members\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e Daily Responsibilities \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e80 Hands On\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003e20% Team Collaboration\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e \u003cstrong\u003eThe Offer\u003c/strong\u003e \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eBonus\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e You will receive the following benefits: \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eMedical Insurance \u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eDental Benefits\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003eVision Benefits\u003c/li\u003e \u003cli\u003ePaid Time Off (PTO)\u003c/li\u003e \u003c/ul\u003e Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.\u003cbr /\u003e Mid Software Engineer

title: .Net Software Engineer / Chicago
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Motion Recruitment, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>\u003cp\u003eOur client, a non-profit organization based in the NorthWest Suburbs, is seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing applications using C# and .NET, with a focus on creating robust code. The releases of these applications will be carried out using Azure cloud infrastructure building pipelines.\u003c/p\u003e \u003cp\u003eWe are looking for a seasoned developer who possesses strong skills in SQL server. This expertise will greatly contribute to the success of the individual in this position.\u003c/p\u003e Required Skills &amp; Experience \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e6+ years of experience with C# and .NET technology(.NET 6, MVC 5) \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eFull-stack development experience with JavaScript(Angular 12+) \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eExpert at working with SQL server \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eSkilled at working with ORM like Entity, LINQ \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eCI/CD experience, building pipelines \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eAbility to work in Scrum environment \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eGreat communication skills both written and verbal. \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e Desired Skills &amp; Experience \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e.NET core, .NET 6 experience \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eExperience with Azure tools Azure DevOps, Azure Service Bus CosmoDB, Azure Data Factory \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eJavaScript experience using Angular \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e What You Will Be Doing \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003e30% Frontend work \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e70% Backend work \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e The Offer \u003cul\u003e \u003cli\u003eYou will receive the following benefits: \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eMedical Insurance \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eDental Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eVision Benefits \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003ePaid Time Off \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e401K with 10% match \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003eWellness Benefit \u003c/li\u003e\u003cli\u003e\u003cbr /\u003e *Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future* \u003c/li\u003e\u003c/ul\u003e Full Stack .NET Developer

title: Mid Software Engineer
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Syeta Inc, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p><strong>Title: Enterprise Cloud Software Engineer</strong><p><br></p><strong>Location: Riverwoods, IL</strong><p><br></p><strong>Duration: 6+ Months</strong><p><br></p><strong>Experience: 10+ Years</strong><p><br></p><strong>Job Qualifications &amp; Experience</strong><p><br></p><strong>Education:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field or equivalent experience</li><li>Required: Advanced/Professional Technical Certificate in Azure, AWS or Kubernetes</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Experience:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Minimum 10 years of experience in enterprise software development management</li><li>Minimum 5 years of experience in a Cloud Development or Software Engineering leading role</li><li>Solid and proven experience with design patterns, SOLID Principles, especially cloud resiliency patterns, working in an agile environment with an SDLC like Scrum, SaFE, etc.</li><li>Having a wide range of experiences and advanced technical acumen serving as an advisor to management</li><li>Communicating difficult concepts and influencing others to adopt a different point of view</li><li>Being able to write scalable production-grade code leveraging Cloud software development kit (SDKs) and Cloud APIs in (at least) one of the following programming languages: Python, Java, NodeJS or Ruby</li><li>Experience with automated deployments utilizing continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tools (such as Azure DevOps, GitLab, GitHub, Jenkins or other well-known tools)</li><li>Experience with release management, product rollouts, and service operationalization</li><li>Solid understanding of core AWS &amp; Azure Services, working knowledge of CLIs, and cloud software development kit (SDKs)</li><li>Enthusiasm for staying abreast of industry trends and a keen eye for product improvements</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Soft Skills:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Team working</li><li>A logical approach to work</li><li>The ability to prioritize tasks/organize work</li><li>Excellent oral, written and interpersonal English communication skills including strong presentation skills.</li><li>Availability to work on extra time</li><li>Problem-solving skills</li><li>Patience</li><li>Meticulous attention to details</li></ul>

Experience</strong><p><br></p><strong>Education:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field or equivalent experience</li><li>Required: Advanced/Professional Technical Certificate in Azure, AWS or Kubernetes</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Experience:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Minimum 10 years of experience in enterprise software development management</li><li>Minimum 5 years of experience in a Cloud Development or Software Engineering leading role</li><li>Solid and proven experience with design patterns, SOLID Principles, especially cloud resiliency patterns, working in an agile environment with an SDLC like Scrum, SaFE, etc.</li><li>Having a wide range of experiences and advanced technical acumen serving as an advisor to management</li><li>Communicating difficult concepts and influencing others to adopt a different point of view</li><li>Being able to write scalable production-grade code leveraging Cloud software development kit (SDKs) and Cloud APIs in (at least) one of the following programming languages: Python, Java, NodeJS or Ruby</li><li>Experience with automated deployments utilizing continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) tools (such as Azure DevOps, GitLab, GitHub, Jenkins or other well-known tools)</li><li>Experience with release management, product rollouts, and service operationalization</li><li>Solid understanding of core AWS &amp; Azure Services, working knowledge of CLIs, and cloud software development kit (SDKs)</li><li>Enthusiasm for staying abreast of industry trends and a keen eye for product improvements</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Soft Skills:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Team working</li><li>A logical approach to work</li><li>The ability to prioritize tasks/organize work</li><li>Excellent oral, written and interpersonal English communication skills including strong presentation skills.</li><li>Availability to work on extra time</li><li>Problem-solving skills</li><li>Patience</li><li>Meticulous attention to details</li></ul>

title: Full Stack .NET Developer
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Cloudious LLC, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!<p><br></p>CyberArk AAM/Conjur engineer<p><br></p>Contract-6 Months+<p><br></p>Chicago/IL OR Richardson,TX<p><br></p>Rate::$70/hr on C2C All inclusive<p><br></p>This position is part of the Security Design team, which encompasses secrets management through AAM and Conjur, privileged access engineering through CyberArk, and new identity orchestration and automation capabilities.<p><br></p><ul><li>5+ years of combined experience as a Security Engineer.</li><li>echnical experience with a Privileged Identity Management solution such as CyberArk.</li><li>Will be tasked with helping integrate applications across the landscape to leverage CyberArk's AAM suite and Conjur (DAP) which focuses on eliminating hard coded</li><li>credentials stored in application source code. This involves consulting with application development teams and assisting with refactoring source code to leverage RESTful API integrations which call back to the enterprise password vault. CyberArk AAM components include the agent-less Central Credential Prover, agent-based Credential Providers for OS systems and agent-less Conjur Dynamic Access Provider for server-less applications.</li><li>Must be proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and related frameworks (e.g., Node.js, React, Angular).</li><li>Familiarity with DevOps CI/CD tools, such as Ansible, Puppet, Jenkins and Terraform.</li><li>Experience integrating RESTful APIs across multiple technologies and applications using custom scripted processes.</li><li>Must be able to support technical server level administration for Windows and RHEL operating systems.</li><li>Experience using Postman or other API testing software for web service calls.</li><li>Must be knowledgeable with source code management tools such as Bitbucket and GitHub.</li><li>Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment and interface with stakeholders at various levels.</li></ul>
